headline: CEO at Maplewave
summary:
As CEO of Maplewave, a leading telecom solution provider, I‚Äôm focused on growth, strategic planning, and nurturing our culture.

It‚Äôs my belief that a high-performing, goal-focused, and empowered team can achieve anything. Since joining Maplewave in 2007, I‚Äôve emphasized a team-based approach in all projects and business ventures.

I‚Äôm passionate about the talent and opportunities in Atlantic Canadian and International business communities.

experiences.title: President & CEO
experiences.description:
Founded in 1988, Maplewave is a global retail solutions company headquartered in Nova Scotia, Canada. Maplewave has over 30 years of experience in developing and implementing retail management solutions, becoming one of the premier RMS/POS providers for the telecommunications industry, represented globally in over 40 markets.

Maplewave is achieving success by focusing on its core mission; to ‚ÄúInnovate Retail‚Äù.  Maplewave is driven by this mission every day, continuously enhancing existing products, developing new products, partnering with other industry leaders and collaborating with our valued customers to deliver the uncompromising efficiency and innovation they‚Äôve come to expect from Maplewave.

As Maplewave looks to the future; customers, partners and prospects have a lot about which to be excited.  Maplewave is expanding its reach into Europe, South America, Africa and Asia; delivering product capabilities that are both scalable and multi-lingual but also architected to function in some of the most challenging global markets. Additionally, Maplewave has entered into partnerships with some of the largest companies in telecommunications; helping them deliver considerable benefit, and a better experience to their customers. Maplewave facilitates this through product integration, resulting in a tighter customer entanglement and increased revenue for our partners.
